# HelloML

> AI-powered voice agent platform that enables businesses to deploy intelligent
> phone-based customer service agents with automated call handling, appointment
> booking, and real-time transcription.

HelloML provides a complete platform for deploying AI voice agents. Businesses
can set up automated phone handling, book appointments through connected
calendars, answer caller questions from uploaded documents, view call
transcriptions, and manage their customer service operations from a single
dashboard.

## Key Features

- AI voice agents that answer business phone calls 24/7
- Automated appointment booking via Google Calendar and Outlook
- Document-based Q&A from uploaded PDFs and text files
- Real-time call transcription and summaries
- Dedicated provisioned phone numbers per business
- Integration with Google Calendar, Outlook, Google Drive, Notion, and Dropbox

## Use Cases

- Contractors on job sites: agent books estimates while you work
- Hair stylists mid-appointment: agent reschedules no-shows
- Attorneys in court: agent takes messages
- Small business owners: agent handles calls when you can't
